entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:13 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 51 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
